title: Spotify sees revenue growth easing as readies IPO
text:
Spotify sees revenue growth easing as readies IPO 1:48pm BST - 01:48 
Spotify, the world's top selling music streaming service, expects revenue to grow 20-30 percent this year as currency swings slow the pace from 2017. As David Pollard reports, the Swedish company released the figures as it gears up for a highly anticipated stock market listing next week. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
